name: T-Bone Plush Toy
description:
Presenting the meat man himself from the T-Bone and Curtis webcomic brought to you by Austin "UltraPunch" Miller of the UltraPunch Toy Co.

T-Bone Plush measures in at 5 inches tall and is made of soft felt. He is both hand and machine stitched and filled with a poly-fil to keep him huggable.

Made only in a limited run as these are hand made by the artist himself.

name: Seymour Yeti Shirt by UltraPunchToyCo.
description:
Even mythical creatures sometimes feel self conscious. Seymour is no different, but he smiles all the same. He poses here for Mrs. Abominable kindergarten class picture, his hair slicked and eyes wide he's ready for a good year!

This Seymour Yeti shirt is a roomy Lime Green soft cotten shirt with a stitched design of Creatureton Elementary School's newest star pupil.

It is recommended that due to his nice white fur that you hand wash this shirt and hang it up until it's nice and dry.

All of our items are a combo of hand sewn and machine sewn techniques. We will never cut corners to get a project done and be happy knowing you'll have your UltraPunch item for years to come.

name: Mr. Whale Shirt by UltraPunchToyCo.
description:
One day while looking in a giant chest full of dress up clothes a small whale found and great big mustache and a moderately sized cowboy hat. Once the small whale put his new disguise on he was magically transformed into Mr. Whale. He now roams the oceans as a very important gentleman telling all the fish about local laws and writing tickets for illegally parked sea horses.

This Mr. Whale shirt is a roomy Dark Navy soft cotten shirt with a stitched design of our favorite marine mammal cut from felt.

It is recommended that Mr. Whale be hand washed (his favorite) and hung to dry.

All of our items are a combo of hand sewn and machine sewn techniques. We will never cut corners to get a project done and be happy knowing you'll have your UltraPunch item for years to come.

name: Harold the Horned
description:
This is Harold.
He enjoys walks in the park and granny smith apples.

He's from a monstrous-looking, furred race. They have enormous eyes. They are omnivores. They are famous for producing negotiators. They have only one child at a time making Harold a rare breed indeed. Their government is a technocracy that is entirely dysfunctional. They were once a dead people - what brought them back to life is a matter of speculation. Their world of origin is icy and is known for being an excellent place to observe astronomical phenomena.

He is approximately 5" tall and made of lime felt with blue felt accents. Harold sports a super duty light gray wool back.

He is stuffed full with Poly-fil. Which makes him very huggable.
Harold is a combination of hand sewn and machine sewn stitches.

Harold the Horned is made to order and may differ slightly from the one pictured here. If you'd like to request a color change please note the color when purchasing.


● UltraPunch!™ TOY Co. is an independent toy company located in Central Pennsylvania. Dedicated to the idea of handmade and imaginative toys for children and the young at heart.

● All of our items are a combo of hand sewn and machine sewn techniques. Every toy comes sealed and ready to enjoy.

name: Monster Pillow - PINKERS
description:
Monster Pillow Pal - Pinkers

She loves sleep overs and trips to grandmas. Take her with you everywhere you go, she's super soft and ready to hug. She is a den creature so she doesn't mind time in the suitcase, but feels most at home laying right in your bed or watching a few movies with you.

Monster Pillow Pal - Pinkers is 8 1/2" X 9 1/2" and stuffed with Fiberfill and has a squeaker inside for when you feel like hearing her talk. She is made of light weight felt and wool. Hand wash with water.

Monster Pillow Pal - Pinkers is a combination of machine and hand sewn stitches.

Pillow Pals are made to order and may differ slightly from the one pictured here. If you'd like to request a color change please note the color when purchasing.
